description: Detects the manipulation of persistent URLs which could execute malicious code
name: Persistent Outlook Landing Pages
query: (((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*Software\\Microsoft\\Office\\* OR *\\Outlook\\Today\\*)) AND ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*Stamp AND winlog.event_data.Details:"DWORD\ \(0x00000001\)") OR winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*UserDefinedUrl)) AND (NOT ((process.executable:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\Common\ Files\\Microsoft\ Shared\\ClickToRun\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\\Common\ Files\\Microsoft\ Shared\\ClickToRun\\Updates\\*) AND process.executable:*\\OfficeClickToRun.exe))))
author: Tobias Michalski
